body_html:
I'm having the same issue. My error message is

[ 92%] Linking CXX shared library libATen.dylib
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm_backward(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationForwardInference", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, bool, double, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationForwardTraining", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, bool, double, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
...
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/libATen.1.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

My settings:

  • nvcc --version yields V9.1.128
  • clang --version yields 8.1.0 (clang-802.0.42)
  • cat /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h | grep CUDNN_MAJOR -A 2 yields
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_MINOR 0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 5

body:
I'm having the same issue. My error message is
```
[ 92%] Linking CXX shared library libATen.dylib
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm_backward(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationForwardInference", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, bool, double, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
  "_cudnnBatchNormalizationForwardTraining", referenced from:
      at::native::cudnn_batch_norm(at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, bool, double, double) in BatchNorm.cpp.o
...
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/libATen.1.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

My settings:
- `nvcc --version` yields `V9.1.128`
- `clang --version` yields `8.1.0 (clang-802.0.42)`
- `cat /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h | grep CUDNN_MAJOR -A 2` yields
```
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_MINOR 0
#define CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL 5
```
